availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Rickets (Fleming County grocer and trader)

body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, grocer and trader. Kentucky native. Trader in Fleming Countt in 1860. Hired one enslaved person from Jane B. Crain in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, Sherbourne, p. 311. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, Elizaville, District 1, p. 131. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, District 2, p. 6.
